text: Peggy Dow (born Peggy Josephine Varnadow; March 18, 1928)Interview, voicesofoklahoma.com, October 2013; accessed August 11, 2015. is an American philanthropist and actress. She was born in Columbia, Mississippi. Dow made nine movies, most notably as Nurse Kelly in Harvey (1950), and as Judy Greene in Bright Victory (1951).Cathy Logan, "Tulsa's Peggy Dow Knew Him When", Tulsa World, July 3, 1997. She also starred as Laura in Reunion in Reno and as Ellen in You Never Can Tell (both 1951). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Louisiana Category:Actors from Mississippi Category:Actors from Tulsa, Oklahoma Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Philanthropists from Louisiana
title: Peggy Dow
